summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for transportation charges related to a shipment. The invoice details the charges incurred and provides information on the shipment, including the payer and delivery details.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated April 16, 2004, and details transportation charges of $94.78.
The shipment was picked up on April 13, 2004, and delivered on April 16, 2004.
George Sanford is mentioned as the recipient of a shipment sent to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Francis Daylesford is identified as the sender of the shipment to Epstein.
The invoice indicates that it is confidential and includes multiple references to FedEx's internal codes.
